name: Mechamonium
description:
DISCLAIMER (If you play in browser then click on the fullscreen button on the bottom right otherwise the game will not be playable, sorry for the inconvenience )

Hey all. 

The only controls are WASD for movement. Remember to pickup the metal scraps to go past level caps and unlock more weapons for your player. The game is still in beta but we hope that you enjoy.
